22. Built-in Equipment Classes

22. Built-in Equipment Classes¶

Concrete s223:Equipment subclasses.

Legend: Signature shows init (minus self). s223 term is derived from _class_iri if present.

22.1. bob.equipment.architectural.door¶

22.1.1. Door¶

  • Signature: Door(config: 'Dict[str, Any]' = {}, *args, **kwargs: 'Any')

  • Summary: A Equipment is normally a physical entity that one might buy from a vendor - a tangible object designed to accomplish a specific task.

  • s223 term: Door (https://explore.open223.info/s223/Door)
